title: Authenticating problems! Please help!
body:
2 Days ago i began having some weird issues with the game. The client took more than 3 minutes to authenticate me and after i finally logged in, the game wouldn't display my profile, my missions, wouldn't let me create a lobby, accept invites, etc. Obviously i googled the problem, got linked to the connection issues section from riot, changed my dns, restarted my router, computer, used the repair tool and completely preinstalled the game, which at the end kind of helped me. I could play now. Thought i've fixed it forver, except that i was wrong. Now 2 days later me, a friend of mine from the same country (Bulgaria) have the same problems, except now it's worse. After loading for ages into the game and waiting more than 20 minutes for features like creating a lobby to work we managed to get into champion select and guess what.. we couldn't see any champions. So that's a 6 minute punishment for my friend. Few hours later we try again, the problem seems to be fixed now, we get into another champion select and now we cannot ban any champions... (The ban button is grey and seems like everything else is frozen) And after a short delay boom 10 bans suddently appear. Then it's time for us to lock, we cant even do that properly. My friend had chosen yasuo (ofc) and the game didnt let him press lock so he picked ahri and somehow locked in cho'gath??? Anyways what im trying to say is that i really need some help, i ran out of ideas how to fix it and the other "stuck on authenticating" threads dont seem to help. Another interesting thing is that when i open the league client, i see 3 league clients open in the tast manager, not sure if that's supposed to happen.

But yeah here's more info.
Me and my friend are both Bulgarian, but we use different Internet providers. Also i had another guy complain that he  faces the same problems, but for much shorter than us (also uses different internet provider)

When we managed to get in game there was a massive delay sometimes and everything used to freeze and afterwards you could see just everything happening at once (definitely packet buffering or packet loss, not FPS drops), but our ms was consistently low (30-40 ms)

replies.body: I know you've mentioned going through the connection article already, but this is definitely sounding a lot like some kind of connection issue. It may not have anything to do with your network perse, but more along the lines of packet loss which essentially means that the data coming from your network is getting corrupted before it hits our servers. Let's check for that really quick using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743). Try to grab a screenshot of what it says so that we can go over it together!

Here are my network logs for the past 3 days. Custom game with bots.

http://imgur.com/a/t6YyC

It's a small amount of packet loss, but since that was a custom game with bots it might not have shown what would happen in a normal game with 9 other people. There's a chance that the packet loss is the root issue here, and I know a lot of EU players have been having issues with certain ISP nodes. Check out the steps in this [**sticky thread**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) and let me know if those are able to help or not!

I did a ARAM game about 15-20 min and I got in-game and some client lag.
And this is my log. 
http://imgur.com/a/HBsGx

Before the game i did DNS setting and firewall to.

Okay good, that shouldn't be enough packet loss to cause those kinds of issues. I'm thinking this is related to the known EU issues, so go ahead and reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with those network logs so that they can gather more data about this!

Hello Broporo,
I hope you don't mind if I tag along. Let's say that there is coming to the data corruption in my network. My question is what can I do about it? 

Sometimes I get to the client fairly normal. I can make custom game a bit lag here and there, but I don't mind that. The biggest issue for me its... normal ping, normal MS.. and I still get some lag or delayed animations in the game.

I will get so logs later today.

Thank you for your help. :)

Hey Galekin,
It turns out the problem is on RIOT's side. Here's a reddit post which explains more about it: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6kf5zv/league_is_unplayable_for_the_balkan_countries_for/
Anyways, i'm actually finally able to play a game today. (It's been a few days :D) So yeah the riot guy you contacted from the support is correct and they're actually working on fixing the issues as we speak.

I see. Thank for the link.

Nice I hope it will work in future. 
Mine is getting worse now the client is lagging to.

Hey i'm from Slovenia and i have the same problems as you for the past 8 days. I sent ticket to riot and i got this respond.

> Eduard from Player Support here.
> 
> Thank you for the logs you have provided.
> 
> Wish I had better news but it looks like your connection to our servers is passing through a bad node that's outside of your ISP's network, there's nothing we can do from your side but we're going to use the info you've provided to investigate further and resolve the issue.
> 
> I can't provide an estimate for how long this will take but it's our top priority at this point in time. Please let us know if you have any other questions regarding anything else.

So I think there is a big problem with this all over Europe.
Well if they can't do anything about that, i guess we can try to fix it ourselves. Have you tried using a VPN to play?

No i haven't tried VPN. I'm a bit dumb about setting this things up. (I don't know how)
As i understand from that message they are trying to fix this. Please correct me if i'm wrong.
Yeah they're working on it and it's currently their top priority which means that they're working extra hard on it. Hopefully it'll be fixed asap.
I hope so to. Like i said i'm waiting for 8days like this.
